comments:
I just tried to execute the plugin test "ASTTest". When executing this test I get a java.lang.VerifyError.

-------------------------------------
java.lang.VerifyError: (class: org/openarchitectureware/xpand2/parser/XpandLexer, method: mTokens signature: ()V) Illegal target of jump or branch
	at org.openarchitectureware.xpand2.parser.XpandParseFacade.getParser(XpandParseFacade.java:42)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xpand2.parser.XpandParseFacade.file(XpandParseFacade.java:34)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xpand2.core.internal.builder.XpandResourceParser.parse(XpandResourceParser.java:43)
-------------------------------------


The method "XpandLexer::mTokens()" has 2600 LOC and contains 108kB of code. Java has a 64kB limitation per method. 

See also http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=4262078
This bug is years old and still open. Wow.


Suggested workaround: Split the method in several methods that call each other :-(

traces.message: (class: org/openarchitectureware/xpand2/parser/XpandLexer, method: mTokens signature: ()V) Illegal target of jump or branch
